section.heading: No agency power of member as member.

para.text: A member is not an agent of a limited cooperative association solely by reason of being a member.
A person’s status as a member does not prevent or restrict law other than this chapter from imposing liability on a limited cooperative association because of the person’s conduct.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 rewrote the section.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 503 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
